title: Downloading alpha client
body: can someone link the alpha client because my league had an error and i couldnt update it so i just deleted it and i wanted to redownload the client but i cant find it

replies.body: The updated client is Live now and no longer in testing.  You can download League through the [official source](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload), then update to the current version after.  What error were you receivng?
i got the client thank you and i believe the error was a file one like a misplaced one or something?

Thanks for the info here!  This error can happen if your security settings are too strong, and blocking your game files from being read or updated.  You'll want to go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception, otherwise you're likely to run into the issue again.  I hope that helps!
